original_text: As King David approached Bahurim, a man from the same clan as Saul’s family came out from there. His name was Shimei son of Gera, and he cursed as he came out.
korean_text: 다윗 왕이 바후림에 이르매 거기서 사울의 친족 한 사람이 나오니 게라의 아들이요 이름은 시므이라 그가 나오면서 계속하여 저주하고

sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕가 바후림에 가까이 갔을 때,

sentences.original_text: a man from the same clan as Saul's family
sentences.korean_translation: 사울의 가문과 같은 족속에 속한 한 사람이

sentences.original_text: His name was Shimei son of Gera,
and he cursed as he came out.
